name: CULT CREATIVE
description: Cult Creative is a Malaysian-based job platform disrupting the traditional industry by leveraging hybrid and remote work arrangements to access Southeast Asia's creative talent. Cult Creative boasts a community of 11,000 creative professionals specialising in graphic design, social media, copywriting, photography and videography. The platform also has 900 employer brands, such as Nestle, Universal Music Group and Airasia, with a regional presence in Malaysia, Singapore and Australia.
features: Cult Creative has been a great source of talent and learning, even in its infancy.
The quality of their work has been inspiring to see. It's been a great experience
provide a simple and convenient process to access and assess talents."
Headline: Career discovery and networking platform for Southeast Asia’s creative workforce
ShortDescription: Cult Creative is a Malaysian-based job platform disrupting the traditional industry by leveraging hybrid and remote work arrangements to access Southeast Asia's creative talent.
enhanced_description: Cult Creative is a Malaysian-based career discovery and networking job platform designed to disrupt the traditional industry by leveraging hybrid and remote work arrangements. It specializes in connecting employers with Southeast Asia's creative talent, including professionals in graphic design, social media, copywriting, photography, and videography. The platform boasts a community of 11,000 creative professionals and serves 900 employer brands, such as Nestle, Universal Music Group, and Airasia, with a regional presence in Malaysia, Singapore, and Australia. It provides a simple and convenient process for accessing and assessing talent.
key_use_cases: Accessing creative talent in Southeast Asia
Professional networking for the creative workforce
competitive_advantages: Disrupts traditional hiring industry by focusing on hybrid and remote work
Specialization in Southeast Asia's creative talent market
Simple and convenient process for talent access and assessment
